CustomField.description: Pillar is determined based on the Persona, Company Size, Type and Support Level. BTE-2500
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Persona__c, 'Accountant') , 'Care Accountants', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Persona__c, 'Admin'), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size__c, 'Grower 50') ), 'Care Growers 50', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Persona__c, 'Admin'), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size__c, 'Grower 25-49') ), 'Care Growers 25', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Persona__c, 'Admin'), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size__c, 'Standard 5-24'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Benefits'), ISPICKVAL(Support_Level__c, 'Tier 2') ), 'Care Benefits T2', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Persona__c, 'Admin'), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size__c, 'Standard 5-24'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Benefits'), ISPICKVAL(Support_Level__c, 'Tier 1') ), 'Care Benefits T1', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Persona__c, 'Admin'), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size__c, 'Standard 5-24'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Payroll'),ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Taxes')), ISPICKVAL(Support_Level__c, 'Tier 2') ), 'Care Admin Payroll T2', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Persona__c, 'Admin'), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size__c, 'Micro 0-4'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Payroll'),ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Taxes')) ), 'Care Micro-Admin Payroll', IF( ISPICKVAL(Persona__c, 'Member'), 'Care Members', IF( ISPICKVAL(Specialization__c, 'Cancel'), 'Care Client Retention', IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Gusto Global'), 'Care Gusto Global', '' ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Pillar
